snippet: Residual effects of the fire and smoky conditions caused the suspension of some N and Q trains, and the rerouting of R trains; it was unclear when normal service would resume.
lead_paragraph: Residual effects of the fire and smoky conditions caused the suspension of some N and Q trains, and the rerouting of R trains; it was unclear when normal service would resume.

headline.main: Track Fire Disrupts Subway Service on N, Q and R Lines
